column1: Kata Robata////4) Dessert: Tried the sorbet
column3: and the mochi ice cream. ALL soooo delicious and well-done. The sorbet is fresh
column4: and I loved the Yuzu flavor (a japanese citrus fruit- kind of lemony and zesty). The strawberry mochi is awesome
column5: and if you like fried banana
column6: you'll love the tempura banana that comes with this dessert. Pound cake has little crumbles of a type of green tea
